sqlMap.sql: select ss.id, s.sysid,s.sysname, ws.typeid,ws.typename, s.url, ss.port, ss.wsname servicename, ss.servicetype serviceUrn,ss.vchar1 namespace from BSS_SYS_SYSWSCFG ss, BSS_SYS_SYSTEM s, BSS_SYS_WSERVICE ws where s.sysname like concat('%',#sysname#,'%') and ss.sysid = s.sysid and ss.typeid = ws.typeid
sqlMap.select: select 1 from BSS_SYS_SYSWSCFG where sysid = #sysid# and typeid = #typeid# and port = #port#
select sysid systemId,sysname systemName from BSS_SYS_SYSTEM where sysid <> '1'
select w.typeid, w.typename from BSS_SYS_WSERVICE w
sqlMap.update: update BSS_SYS_SYSWSCFG set sysid = #sysid#,typeid = #typeid#,port = #port#,wsname = #servicename#,servicetype = #serviceUrn#,vchar1 = #namespace# where id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT t.id, t.PORT,t.SERVICETYPE,t.SYSID,t.TYPEID,t.WSNAME FROM BSS_SYS_SYSWSCFG t WHERE t.WSNAME=#wsname#
SELECT t.id, t.PORT,t.SERVICETYPE,t.SYSID,t.TYPEID,t.WSNAME FROM BSS_SYS_SYSWSCFG t WHERE t.id=#wsId#
